page.title: 04ST.EDMUND'S SCHOOL.
page.content: {Independent} Founded by The Clergy Orphan Society in 1749. Religious bias:originally C/E but now all faiths {Fees}Boarders:Juniors 1230pounds Seniors1,510pounds Day:Juniors 835 pounds Seniors 1,055pounds per term. {Staff} 54 + 3 part timers. {Pupils} 482 (mixed,mainly boys) {Ages} 7+ - 18+ {Courses}"O"Levels 66 "A"Levels 48 Subjects taught 18 {Facilities} Sports:Gymnasium,sports field,8 tennis courts,3 squash courts swimming pool. {Leisure} Drama,chess,computers,Judo, golf, shooting,canalling,Rugger,netball Soccer,hockey,rounders,athletics,cross country running. Uniform navy,grey,crimson,white. {} {
